markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Omox (Slime Demon)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2898)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Seemingly made from living, animated filth, omoxes have no true anatomy, although they generally spend most of their time in roughly [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=628) shapes, resembling some grim caricatures of half-melted humanoids. While scholars once believed these foul demons to be a pure, concentrated form of the corruption that suffuses the [Outer Rifts](/Planes.aspx?ID=45) and its inhabitants, in truth these demons arise from the souls of those who routinely befouled and polluted their surroundings in life.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 30

**[Recall Knowledge - Ooze](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Omox.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Omox](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2898)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Demon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=573" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=600" />
<trait label="Ooze" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=665" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 79 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Chthonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=114), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Empyrean](/Languages.aspx?ID=115); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=79) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +21, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +24

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +6

**Con** +7

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Cleanly Vulnerability** An omox embodies filth, and they find the concept of cleanliness abhorrent. An omox subjected to an effect that cleans them, such as the tidy command of [_prestidigitation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1639), takes 2d6 mental damage. They also take this damage the first time each round a creature hit by one of the omox's attacks spends actions cleaning off the filth.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +23 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +20 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=644)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 395

</row>

**Immunities**
[acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=524), critical hits, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), precision

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 10, [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517) 10

**Absorb Weapon** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Trigger** A creature hits the omox with a melee weapon; **Effect** The omox attempts to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=2383) the creature. On a critical success, the weapon becomes subsumed within the omox's body rather than falling to the ground. Retrieving the weapon requires Disarming the omox of it.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 80 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sludge tendril +25 ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)),
**Damage** 2d6+13 bludgeoning plus 2d6 acid and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
slime ball +23 ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)),
**Damage** 2d4+11 bludgeoning plus 2d6 acid and slime trap

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 32
- **4th**
[Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724) (at will)
- **5th**
[Control Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=51), [Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53) (at will), [Toxic Cloud](/Spells.aspx?ID=1722), [Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724)

**Rituals** DC 32

- **1st**
[Demonic Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=142)

**Liquid Leap** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) **Requirements** The omox is in a space of liquid; **Effect** The omox teleports from its current space to any unoccupied space of liquid within 120 feet.

**Slime Trap**   A creature hit by an omox's slime ball must succeed at a DC 32 Reflex save or take a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute or until it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296) (DC 35). On a critical failure, the creature is also [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) for the same duration.

**Smother** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The omox has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90); **Effect** The demon flows over the creature, covering it in oozing acidic slime. The creature must succeed at a DC 32 Fortitude save or it becomes [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=59) and must hold its breath or begin [suffocating](/Rules.aspx?ID=468). These effects lasts as long as the omox has the creature grabbed or restrained.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-387" />
name: Omox
